q: Charlotte. The 49ers neutralized Tu Holloway , a player of the year candidate, and handed the Musketeers their first A-10 loss, 66-62. Tu Holloway missed all eight of his three-point tries and went 3 of 17 overall. It's like in football if you're playing Michael Vick , 49ers coach Alan Major told the Charlotte Observer.`` You'd rather Michael Vick throw it than run. We'd rather have[ Tu Holloway ] shooting over you rather than driving around you.'' 9

He said he made his recommendation to President Bush at a National Security Council meeting Feb. 3, 2003, in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later.

The release details were announced yesterday by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer . This launch marks the first time that a product has been provided as an online service before its conventional release, an act that, Steve Ballmer says, really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud. Microsoft previously focused primarily on the on-premises version of Dynamics CRM, putting the company at odds with major competitors such as Salesforce.com's CRM suite. Representative Mike Pence of Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
